strategy: Space Marine armies have a Strategy Rating of 5.
Initiative: All formations have an Initiative Rating of 1+.
usage: The following army list allows you to field an army based on the Ravenguard Space Marine army and successor chapters.

formations.name: Storm Scouts
formations.units: Three Raven Guard Scouts, three Land Speeder Storms

sections.name: Ravenguard Elite Detachments
sections.description: One Elite Detachment may be taken per Core Detachment

formations.name: Sternguard Veteran
extraUnits: The formation replaces 'plus transport' with the 'Teleport' special rule: 25 points

sections.name: Ravenguard Support Detachments
sections.description: One Support Detachment may be taken per Core Detachment

formations.name: Scout
formations.units: Four Raven Guard Scouts plus transport

formations.name: Bikes
formations.units: Any five of the following units: Attack Bike, Assault Bikes

formations.name: Land Speeders
formations.units: Any five of the following units: Land Speeder, Land Speeder Tornado

sections.name: Ravenguard Aircraft & Collegia Titanica Allies
sections.description: Up to a third of the points available may be spent on these formations

formations.name: Warhounds
extraUnits: Add one additional Warhound Titan: 200 points

upgrades.title: Ravenguard Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per detachment

items.name: Battle Barge
items.description: Replace the Strike Cruiser with a Battle Barge

items.name: Commander
items.description: Add any one of the following characters to any unit in the formation

items.name: Anti-Air
items.description: Add any one of the following units to the formation

items.name: Independent
items.description: Grants the Warhound Pack the 'Independent' special rule

items.name: Land Speeders
items.description: Add any two of the following. If the formation can use Drop Pods, these units gain the 'Planetfall' special rule (only roll to scatter once for the entire formation).

items.name: Razorbacks
items.description: Add any number of Razorbacks, up to the number required to transport the formation

items.name: Snipers
items.description: All Scouts in the formation gain the 'Sniper' special rule on their Heavy Bolters

items.name: Storms
items.description: Replace the 'plus transport' with four Land Speeder Storms

items.name: Tempest
items.description: Replace any number of Land Speeders with an equal number of Land Speeder Tempest

items.name: Typhoons
items.description: Replace any number of Land Speeders with an equal number of Land Speeder Typhoons
